import React,{useState,useEffect} from 'react'; import {Link,json,useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import { ToastContainer, toast } from "react-toastify"; import "react-toastify/dist/ReactToastify.css"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import {checkLogout} from '../../redux/userApi/'; import {incProductQty,decProductQty,removeProductCart} from '../../redux/productApi/'; axios.defaults.withCredentials = true const Checkout = ()=>{ const auth = useSelector((state) => state.loginRes.isUserLogin); const userData = useSelector((state) => state.loginRes.authData); const cartItems = useSelector((state) => state.cartItem.cartItems); const total = useSelector((state) => state.cartItem.totalPrice); const subTotal = useSelector((state) => state.cartItem.subTotal); const shippingCost = useSelector((state) => state.cartItem.shippingCost); const navigate = useNavigate(); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const API_BASE_URL = process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL const placeOrder = ()=>{ const [name,setName] = useState(""); const [email,setEmail] = useState(""); const [address,setAddress] = useState(""); const [city,setCity] = useState(""); const [state,setState] = useState(""); const [zip,setZip] = useState(""); const [country,setCountry] = useState(""); const [error,setError] = useState(false); } return (
Checkout
Complete your shipping and payment details below.

Shipping & Billing Information

Payment Information

Order Summary

    { cartItems.length>0 ? cartItems.map((item,index)=>
  • {item.product_title}
    {item.qty} x ₹{item.product_price} ₹{item.product_price}
    • ) : 'No item in cart' }
Subtotal ₹{subTotal}
Shipping ₹{shippingCost}
Total ₹{total}
) } export default Checkout
